word: He said if He went away He would send the Comforter, and this Comforter "shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you" (John 14:26). And when the Holy Spirit should come upon them they would testify of Him. Human beings were to become partakers of the divine nature. But it is impossible to connect with heaven and communicate light to others while you are careless in words and actions. Truth has its work to do upon the heart and life. It sanctifies the receiver.
